description: This smoked salmon and avocado salad is a perfect quick lunch option with a zingy lemon and dill dressing.
keywords: Salads,Pescatarian,Salad,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Smoked Salmon & Avocado Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together lemon juice, olive oil and dill and season to taste.
Slice the cucumber into thin strips with a vegetable peeler and finely slice the red onion into half moons.
Slice the avocados in half, remove the stone, scoop the flesh out with a spoon and cut into half moons.
Add the spinach, avocado, cucumber and red onion to a large bowl, pour over the dressing and mix well.
Divide the salad mix between 4 plates, top with slices of smoked salmon and serve.
